text: Forst-Längenbühl is a municipality in the administrative district of Thun in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2007, the former municipalities of Forst and Längenbühl merged into the new municipality of Forst-Längenbühl. ==References== Category:2007 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Thun
title: Forst-Längenbühl
